install.name: System - SEOSimple
install.author: Dao By Design
install.description: This native Joomla 1.5 plugin automatically generates description meta tags by pulling text from the content to help with SEO. It also gives you the ability to set different title configurations. You are using Version 1.4 of the plugin.

param.name: length
param.label: Meta Desc. Length
param.description: The length of the meta description content (in characters). This will be rounded off to the nearest word.

param.name: titorder
param.label: Title Layout
param.description: Select how you'd like your page titles to be displayed. Default is [Page Title] | [Site Title].

param.name: separator
param.label: Separator
param.description: This is the character that separates your page titles from your site name. By default it is a pipe - but you can change it to whatever you like. When saving some characters Joomla adds backslashes to 'escape' them - they shouldn't appear in the actual title.

param.name: fptitle
param.label: Optional Front Page Title
param.description: Enter a custom title tag for your site's front page. If left blank, 'Home' will be used.

param.name: fptitorder
param.label: Front Page Title Layout
param.description: Select how you'd like your front page title to be displayed. Default is [Optional FP Title] | [Site Title].

param.name: fpdesc
param.label: Use Global meta description for front page
param.description: If 'Yes', the meta description set in the Global Config/Metadata Settings will be used. If 'No', the meta description will be generated by the plugin, using the contents of the page.
param.option: No, Generate based on page content.

param.name: credittag
param.label: SEOSimple Credit Tag
param.description: This is a non-site affecting meta tag that gives this plugin a bit of credit. We'd love if you kept it, but you're welcome to remove it.
